response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a unique opportunity tailored specifically to meet your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to you, we're offering it to you at a special price of $9,500. This is a fair deal that allows us to recover our investment while ensuring you receive a great value for your money. We're confident this offer will not only meet but exceed your expectations.
